gameWindow.Entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameWindow.Entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Badguy, Bullet, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  Entity.eTYPE
      The classification of the entity in relation to the player: HARMLESS indicates that it cannot hurt the player, but can hurt enemies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(double xLocation,
              double yLocation,
              int Health,
              double yVelocity,
              double xVelocity,
              double Height,
              double Width,
              int size,
              int hitR)
        Parameters:
        xLocation - Sets the starting xLocation of the Entity
        yLocation - Sets the starting yLocation of the Entity
        Health - Sets the starting health of the Entity
        yVelocity - Sets the starting yVelocity of the Entity
        xVelocity - Sets the starting xVelocity of the Entity
        Height - Sets the starting height of the Entity
        Width - Sets the starting width of the Entity
        size - Sets the starting size of the Entity
        hitR - Sets the hitbox radius of the Entity
